findings.title: Unnecessary Matching in Unstake Process
findings.description: In the unstakeProcessed function of StakedLyxToken contract, unnecessary matching occurs when unstakeAmount > totalPendingUnstake, resulting in extra gas consumption.

findings.title: Redundant Parameter in the Initialize Function
findings.description: In the `initialize` function of the Pool contract, the parameter `_withdrawalCredentials` is redundant, as all validator’s withdrawal credentials are set to the address of the Reward contract and reward contract’s address is already set by the initialization parameter `_rewards`.
